titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress in remembrance of the 100th anniversary of the devastating hurricane which struck Galveston, Texas, on September 8, 1900.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 9/7/2000--Introduced. Urges the President to issue a proclamation commemorating the 100th anniversary of the hurricane that devastated Galveston, Texas, on September 8, 1900.
